content.rendered:
The Office of International Services and Study Abroad assists all international students with inquiries regarding I-20 processing and visa information. They assist students with the process once a student has been admitted and submitted the tuition deposit.

Resources

  • Getting an I-20 from La Verne
  • Applying for a U.S. Visa
  • Visa Application Forms
  • Information on Student Visas
  • Study in the States
  • Optional Practical Training (OPT)
  • List of U.S. Embassies, Consulates, and Diplomatic Missions
